content.text:
A ZoneAlias is a convenient grouping of NVMe entities identified and is referenceable by a ZoneAlias name.
The detailed representation of a ZoneAlias is shown in Figure 754.

tables.title: Table_8_3_2_3_6_ZoneAlias
tables.table_md:
| Bytes | Description |
|:---|:---|
| 123:00 | **ZoneAlias Name (ZANAME):** This field contains an ASCII encoded null-terminated string, NULL padded as necessary to the 124-byte maximum length. |
| 125:124 | **Number of ZoneAlias Members (NUMZAM):** This field specifies the number of ZoneAlias members contained in this ZoneAlias. The value of this field is represented as n. |
| 127:126 | **Reserved** |
| | **ZoneAlias Member List** |
| 383:128 | **ZoneAlias Member 1:** This field contains the first ZoneAlias member contained in this ZoneAlias. |
| 639:384 | **ZoneAlias Member 2:** This field contains the second ZoneAlias member contained in this ZoneAlias (if present). |
| ... | ... |
| 256*n+127:256*n+128 | **ZoneAlias Member n:** This field contains the last ZoneAlias member contained in this ZoneAlias (if present). |
